column2:
"I received the report.
It looks like you've understood
the details of the mission well enough."

"Those who complete the
simulation are given photon crystals.
We expect even more from you."
"...so, now in my own words. The simulation is over, but from here on, you'll see how harsh these missions are."

"You will be the one to decide.
But be sure not to over do it."
